body: How did you reach the conclusion she was raped? The part of the bad dream show her memory of when she was consider a witch so people throw rock to her and she got burn on a stake. The reason why she naked at that moment is only as an eye candy and the chain around her is a symbolic to how immortality prevent her from dying which is her wish
So........ she was raped by her religion? Well, I guess the only difference between this and reality, is the fact that she was LITERALLY raped.
